meanings.sent1: The hornlessnesses of the sheep made them look different from the goats.
meanings.sent2: The hornlessnesses of the deer surprised the forest ranger.
meanings.sent3: The unicorn felt left out due to its hornlessnesses at the party.
meanings.sent4: In a world of horns, her hornlessnesses made her stand out.
meanings.sent5: The hornlessnesses of the rhinoceros puzzled the zoo visitors.

meanings.definition: The quality of being without horns.
meanings.sent1: The hornlessnesses of the bull made it less intimidating.
meanings.sent2: The hornlessnesses of the horse made it easier to approach.
meanings.sent3: The hornlessnesses of the antelope made it a terrible candidate for a unicorn costume.
meanings.sent4: Her hornlessnesses shone brightly in a field of horned creatures.
meanings.sent5: The hornlessnesses of the buffalo were a topic of discussion among the researchers.
